summary: Implemented global tab numbering in WezTerm by adding get_global_tab_position() helper function that iterates all windows via wezterm.mux.all_windows(), sorts tab IDs by creation order, and returns the global position. Integrated into format-tab-title handler with pcall fallback. Updated wezterm-integration.md documentation.
